entry.title: Starting New Role As Rails Developer

link.title: Starting New Role As Rails Developer

entry.content:
This coming November, I will be working in a different company as a Rails Developer, and I am so excited about it.

It was really hard to leave my current employer, after more than two years of working there. I really felt like they were my family.

Before I start to work in my new company, they want me to study ruby basics, gems, and rails basics as well. Funny thing is, this blog is created using jekyll gem. That means I have a bit of background in ruby.
entry.summary: This coming November, I will be working in a different company as a Rails Developer, and I am so excited about it. It was really hard to leave my current employer, after more than two years of working there. I really felt like they were my family. Before I start to work in my new company, they want me to study ruby basics, gems, and rails basics as well. Funny thing is, this blog is created using jekyll gem. That means I have a bit of background in ruby.

entry.title: Panalo na, Natalo pa
entry.content:
Forgive me to use Filipino words to give a title for this blog. Honestly, I’ve been googling for a translation of this in english but I couldn’t find anywhere.

But I think you are familiar with this scenario. Let’s say you are playing in a chess tournament, and you have a winning advantage and you can simplify your play to an endgame. But you committed ONE simple blunder, and that made you lose the game instead in the end.

It is just the same at work. When you know for yourself that you are doing great in your work, but then you make one simple mistake and it blows up everything else into more complicated issues.

Maybe that’s the reason why some of us would come up with the idea and make it a life decision to live a simple life. A definition of a simple life is living your whole life avoiding troubles or misunderstandings with others. You could also say that a simple life is to live self-sufficiently. But this could also mean living your life avoiding risks and challenges. Because it is part of life to encounter troubles; it’s just not right to say that to live a simple life will be problem-free.
entry.summary: Forgive me to use Filipino words to give a title for this blog. Honestly, I’ve been googling for a translation of this in english but I couldn’t find anywhere. But I think you are familiar with this scenario. Let’s say you are playing in a chess tournament, and you have a winning advantage and you can simplify your play to an endgame. But you committed ONE simple blunder, and that made you lose the game instead in the end. It is just the same at work. When you know for yourself that you are doing great in your work, but then you make one simple mistake and it blows up everything else into more complicated issues. Maybe that’s the reason why some of us would come up with the idea and make it a life decision to live a simple life. A definition of a simple life is living your whole life avoiding troubles or misunderstandings with others. You could also say that a simple life is to live self-sufficiently. But this could also mean living your life avoiding risks and challenges. Because it is part of life to encounter troubles; it’s just not right to say that to live a simple life will be problem-free.

entry.title: Battling Depression
entry.content:
I just recently consulted a doctor and the doctor’s impression on me is that I have major depression, sleep apnea, high blood pressure.

Now knowing that I am suffering from depression, I had a realization that most of the pain I am suffering from could be hallucination or imaginary.

I want to confirm it for myself if I am really suffering from depression, so I am going to consult a psychiatrist.

I am writing this blog post to inform anyone whoever reads this. If someone in your family discloses that he or she is suffering from depression, please let him or her to understand that he or she is not alone. The person needs more support now.
entry.summary: I just recently consulted a doctor and the doctor’s impression on me is that I have major depression, sleep apnea, high blood pressure. Now knowing that I am suffering from depression, I had a realization that most of the pain I am suffering from could be hallucination or imaginary. I want to confirm it for myself if I am really suffering from depression, so I am going to consult a psychiatrist. I am writing this blog post to inform anyone whoever reads this. If someone in your family discloses that he or she is suffering from depression, please let him or her to understand that he or she is not alone. The person needs more support now.

entry.title: Going Back To Blogging Again
entry.content:
Blogging is like a therapy for me because it enables me to communicate my thoughts well as if I am talking to a live person and it also helps me to organize my thoughts and ideas and let me say everything in the right process.

So here I am again, I am back to be blogging again.

But my purpose of making blog posts was to remind myself in the future the lessons I learned and experience I gained from those lessons.

I am planning to make vlogs as well. I watched some youtubers on how they make their vlogs. I bought the fisheye lens from CDR King. I also just recently purchased a mic for a mobile phone from Amazon. I hope the package will arrive soon.

cutting this blog post short. Peace to all. And God bless.
entry.summary: Blogging is like a therapy for me because it enables me to communicate my thoughts well as if I am talking to a live person and it also helps me to organize my thoughts and ideas and let me say everything in the right process. So here I am again, I am back to be blogging again. But my purpose of making blog posts was to remind myself in the future the lessons I learned and experience I gained from those lessons. I also just recently purchased a mic for a mobile phone from Amazon. I hope the package will arrive soon. cutting this blog post short. Peace to all. And God bless.

entry.title: Weird Dream, Lost A Shoe
entry.content:
Last night, I had a weird dream.

I dreamt that I was going to work and there was a building construction on going on the sidewalk. I had to climb up on something, like a pole or a very high bridge to pass through. Then my left shoe fell into a mud or a cement mix. I had no choice but to retrieve my shoe there.

I realized that I was not the only one who lost a shoe. There were also others that lost their shoe in the mud ( or cement mix.) I tried to look for my left shoe but couldn’t find it.
entry.summary: Last night, I had a weird dream. I dreamt that I was going to work and there was a building construction on going on the sidewalk. I had to climb up on something, like a pole or a very high bridge to pass through. Then my left shoe fell into a mud or a cement mix. I had no choice but to retrieve my shoe there. I realized that I was not the only one who lost a shoe. There were also others that lost their shoe in the mud ( or cement mix.) I tried to look for my left shoe but couldn’t find it.

entry.title: End Of Week Journal Entry 3rdWeek Feb 2019

link.title: End Of Week Journal Entry 3rdWeek Feb 2019

entry.content:
Hi, This is You From The Past!

I just want to tell you that ever since I played chess, I felt wonderful. It’s not about winning or losing. It’s about learning from mistakes, building courage, making new friends.

I also want to tell you that I feel wonderful to pursue this new job opportunity. It will help you to learn more about Ruby On Rails. I hope you were able to get that job opportunity. Aja! You can do it!
entry.summary: Hi, This is You From The Past! I just want to tell you that ever since I played chess, I felt wonderful. It’s not about winning or losing. It’s about learning from mistakes, building courage, making new friends. I also want to tell you that I feel wonderful to pursue this new job opportunity. It will help you to learn more about Ruby On Rails. I hope you were able to get that job opportunity. Aja! You can do it!

entry.title: Playing Chess Again
entry.content:
Hi, This is from your past.

Last year, Rad and I had an agreement to join the year-ender chess tournament. On the day of the tournament, I was not able to join. It’s because I was afraid to lose. And also, it has been a very long long time since I played chess and so focused on practicing and studying positions.

On Feb 17, 2019, I decided to join this time to play. Rad was there with his son.

It felt wonderful to play again despite of not winning many games. I missed the feeling.

I am telling you, my future self, to pursue chess! It’s fun! It’s what you want since you were a kid.
entry.summary: Hi, This is from your past. Last year, Rad and I had an agreement to join the year-ender chess tournament. On the day of the tournament, I was not able to join. It’s because I was afraid to lose. And also, it has been a very long long time since I played chess and so focused on practicing and studying positions. On Feb 17, 2019, I decided to join this time to play. Rad was there with his son. It felt wonderful to play again despite of not winning many games. I missed the feeling. I am telling you, my future self, to pursue chess! It’s fun! It’s what you want since you were a kid.

entry.title: End Of Week Journal 2nd Week Feb 2019

link.title: End Of Week Journal 2nd Week Feb 2019

entry.content:
Hello, This is You From The Past!

For this week, I want you to know that you have to be productive during weekends. If you remember, Jason Selk said in his book that the body tends to be at rest if it is not moving. In my understanding, if you don’t do anything productive, you won’t be able to do anything.

Now I am encouraging you to start working on those personal projects you were working on. There are so many things you can do and don’t waste your time. Be productive!
entry.summary: Hello, This is You From The Past! For this week, I want you to know that you have to be productive during weekends. If you remember, Jason Selk said in his book that the body tends to be at rest if it is not moving. In my understanding, if you don’t do anything productive, you won’t be able to do anything. Now I am encouraging you to start working on those personal projects you were working on. There are so many things you can do and don’t waste your time. Be productive!

entry.title: End Of Week Journal 1st Week Feb 2019

link.title: End Of Week Journal 1st Week Feb 2019

entry.content:
Hello, This is You From The Past!

I am blogging these incidents that happened during the week or even earlier.

  1. Our guest came to our site office and caught one of our colleagues using his personal phone mostly during the day. I just learned later that this issue was escalated to our manager in the US.

  2. During the week, I was mostly busy figuring out this particular task I am working on. Basically, we accept csv files from suppliers to parse and upload it on our database. But this particular csv file contains lots of weird characters, weird values or garbled data. I had to do testing the parsing of csv file and fix the logic and behavior until the process totally works fine.

  3. I reset my personal laptop to factory settings because the wifi adapter drivers are not functioning properly. When you encounter the error message saying “Error code 10”, that means that the drivers are corrupted and may need to download the drivers from the official site and install it again. SO I did that and everything works again. But because the laptop is reset, all the software I had previously installed before are gone.
entry.summary: Hello, This is You From The Past! I am blogging these incidents that happened during the week or even earlier. Our guest came to our site office and caught one of our colleagues using his personal phone mostly during the day. I just learned later that this issue was escalated to our manager in the US. During the week, I was mostly busy figuring out this particular task I am working on. Basically, we accept csv files from suppliers to parse and upload it on our database. But this particular csv file contains lots of weird characters, weird values or garbled data. I had to do testing the parsing of csv file and fix the logic and behavior until the process totally works fine. I reset my personal laptop to factory settings because the wifi adapter drivers are not functioning properly. When you encounter the error message saying “Error code 10”, that means that the drivers are corrupted and may need to download the drivers from the official site and install it again. SO I did that and everything works again. But because the laptop is reset, all the software I had previously installed before are gone.
